# value

**Instance Property**

A Base64URL-encoded JSON string that represents the external purchase token.

## Declaration

```swift
let value: String
```

## Discussion

For information about the token, see [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/receiving-and-decoding-external-purchase-tokens].
title: value
